statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles
SELECT username FROM player_profiles
SELECT achievements FROM player_profiles
SELECT stats FROM player_profiles
SELECT username, achievements FROM player_profiles
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, stats -> 'level' as player_level FROM player_profiles WHERE stats -> 'experience' > 1000;
SELECT username, achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements LIKE '%completed%';
SELECT username, stats -> 'health' as player_health FROM player_profiles WHERE stats -> 'health' < 50;
SELECT username, stats -> 'level' as player_level, achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE stats -> 'level' > 10 AND achievements IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT username, achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE stats LIKE '%win%';
SELECT username, stats FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, achievements FROM player_profiles ORDER BY achievements DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe'
SELECT username, stats FROM player_profiles WHERE achievements LIKE '%complete%'
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT achievements, stats FROM player_profiles WHERE LENGTH(stats) > 50
SELECT username, achievements FROM player_profiles ORDER BY LENGTH(achievements) ASC
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT id, username FROM player_profiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, stats FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 3;
SELECT achievements.achievement_name, player_profiles.username FROM achievements JOIN player_profiles ON achievements.player_id = player_profiles.id;
SELECT * FROM stats WHERE wins > 10 AND losses < 5 ORDER BY games_played DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT stats->>'games_played' AS games_played, stats->>'wins' AS wins FROM stats WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT p.username, a.achievement_name, s.games_played FROM player_profiles p JOIN achievements a ON p.id = a.player_id JOIN stats s ON p.id = s.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, stats -> 'wins' AS wins_count FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, achievements -> 'completed' AS completed_achievements FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements WHERE achievement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, matches_played, wins, losses FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT id, username, achievements, stats FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM user_achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, matches_played, wins, losses FROM player_stats WHERE wins > 10 ORDER BY matches_played ASC;
SELECT player_id, experience_level, experience_points FROM player_experience WHERE experience_points BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM player_stats ps JOIN player_profiles pp ON ps.player_id = pp.id WHERE pp.username = 'john.doe';
SELECT * FROM player_profile ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT player_id, username, total_achievements FROM player_profile WHERE total_achievements > 10;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, stat_name, stat_value FROM stats ORDER BY stat_value DESC;
SELECT friend_id, player_id, friend_username FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM player_profile WHERE total_achievements > 10 ORDER BY total_achievements DESC;

SELECT p.username, a.achievement_name, s.stat_name FROM player_profile p INNER JOIN achievements a ON p.player_id = a.player_id INNER JOIN stats s ON p.player_id = s.player_id WHERE s.stat_value > 50;
SELECT p.username, COUNT(f.friend_id) AS friend_count FROM player_profile p LEFT JOIN player_friends f ON p.player_id = f.player_id GROUP BY p.player_id HAVING friend_count > 5;

SELECT p.username, a.achievement_name, s.stat_name FROM player_profile p, achievements a, stats s, achievements_stats ast WHERE p.player_id = ast.player_id AND a.achievement_id = ast.achievement_id AND s.stat_id = ast.stat_id;

SELECT p.username, a.achievement_name, s.stat_name FROM achievements_stats ast JOIN player_profile p ON ast.player_id = p.player_id JOIN achievements a ON ast.achievement_id = a.achievement_id JOIN stats s ON ast.stat_id = s.stat_id ORDER BY p.total_achievements ASC, s.stat_value DESC;
